website_summaries.verdict: Although there are better options, it's a good buy if you have a larger tree.
pros: Especially useful for trees that are more than 10 feet in height
cons: The screws can dig into the wood, leaving the nuts stuck inside when you try to disassemble

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find substantial and sturdy christmas tree stands these days, and this stand is both substantial and sturdy. I like that it has a large water reservoir too, as plenty of water is necessary to keep your tree needles soft and pliable all the way until New Years. Also, how awesome is it to be able to order something like this online and get it shipped to your house!? My small town has very few options and I was glad to have this delivered to my door in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Miss.sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, found the same one at Lowes for $42.00
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: No I haven’t used it yet but I can tell I won’t have any problems. It’s all metal so there are no plastic parts to get stripped, the base is wide and the feet are covered at the tips so your floor won’t get scratched. It says it can handle up to a 12’ tree but I’m only going to get an 8’ tree. And there is also a limited lifetime warranty. The only thing I didn’t like is that it’s made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this stand
customer_reviews.text: We used this stand on a 7 foot fairly wide blue spruce Christmas tree. The first time we stood the tree up it slipped off the supports on the bottom of the stand. Be sure the tree is firmly wedged in place and the screws all tightened before attempting to set up the tree. We had no other problems once we reset the tree firmly against the base. It is very solid. Also it is very easy to water the tree with this stand. We recommend this product to others. The large size might be better for anything over 7ft trees.
customer_reviews.author: nancyz

customer_reviews.title: Worked great this holiday - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This tree stand holds 2.5 gallons. Worked great this holiday - highly recommend.! We also bought miracle grow for christmas trees. 1 month later, needles dont fall off that much. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine G.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced - but decent
customer_reviews.text: They don’t build Christmas tree stands like they used to! This was a gauge for price ($75~), but we were in need of one for the new house, so you do what you have to do. I was looking for a metal stand, and there were none left in-stores, so what can ya do? I hope it lasts 40+ years.
customer_reviews.author: MarketBuzz

customer_reviews.title: Great for big trees
customer_reviews.text: We get an 11-12 ft tree and our old stand just couldn't take it. Put the tree in, tightened the bolts, and the tree stayed upright first try, didn't even need to tie it to the wall :) and it holds a lot of water so less crawling under the tree.
customer_reviews.author: LSP

customer_reviews.title: Last tree stand you'll need
customer_reviews.text: I believe in buying it well, and only buying it once; that the initial purchase price is only one measure of value. This steel stand holds 10' trees with ease and is going to be with us for a long time. Not only is it built well, but contacting the manufacturer yields prompt responsive customer support. My wife and I are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: OrlandoTom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand for the perfect (or imperfect) tree
customer_reviews.text: My husband always buys a crazy tree. It’s always too tall, too wide or has a crooked trunk. We almost always have to tie the tree to the wall to keep it from falling over. This year we switched to this stand and it was PERFECT! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: TheSquaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Holds up a big tree
customer_reviews.text: And the design is simple without resorting to too-heavy- to- pick- up! Wide opening allows for easier watering. It's a really good stand.
customer_reviews.author: Winterberry

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid stand. Held my tree up nicely and was easy to screw in to place. And the water basin holds a decent amount of water so I wasn't watering the tree every day
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy tree stand. I expect that we will get many years out of it. Our 7 foot tree was easy to place in the stand and screw into place. I would recommend having at least 2 people to direct the stand into the hole and keep it held up straight while the pins are tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very well made updated old school stand. First Christmas with it so can't comment much more. You should be happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: eloomis

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Sturdy and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking everywhere for a strong tree stand that won’t fall over once the tree is in it!! The tree was so easy to get in the stand and get it set up! Good size to fit a variety of trunk sizes.
customer_reviews.author: KarlaL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I can get big tree in my house now
customer_reviews.author: Chanty Chut

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny trees too
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks like it will last forever. Worked great for our tiny 4 foot tree this year and could easily accommodate something huge too.
customer_reviews.author: wishiwereemo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy straight forward stand
customer_reviews.text: Good stand seems a little small for their big stand, but sturdy enough to do the job, and its not plastic thank goodness. Build quality seemed a little crude the legs weren't welded completely symmetrical like they didn't weld it in a jig. I'm just being picky though, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LIFETIME INVESTMENT FOR LIVE CHRISTMAS TREE BUYERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT tree stand - It NEVER ran out of water because of the big capacity (1 gallon) and was heavy and wide-legged enough to make the tree stable!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah JK Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Setting up our tree was very easy. The stand is truly heavy-duty
customer_reviews.text: Setting up our tree was very easy. The stand is truly heavy-duty. Don't see why it couldn't be a lifetime purchase. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Griswold

customer_reviews.title: The search is over
customer_reviews.text: The last tree stand you will ever need. After years of battling, re-centering, holding, tightening, loosening, and finally fighting with my wife trying to stand up the tree, I invested in this beast. It’s a life saver, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Syphrit

customer_reviews.title: Exellent Tree Stand
customer_reviews.text: Just put up my 10 ft tree and this thing works like a champ. Very sturdy, very heavy, the clamps are great and sturdy too. I put the stand on the tree outside and pulled it in on the stand - had to correct it a bit and done. Put some glycerol in the base and a gallon of water on top - I dont see anything to improve, great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tree stand
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tree stand, currently holding a 12' tree with zero issues. Very stable. (note, probably best for carpet as the pads are not all in the same plane, will rock a bit on hard floors).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but trees suck that up in a few days
customer_reviews.text: Solid. worth the money. Will have this for years to come. Held an 8.5 foot tree solid. Holds 2 gallons of water in the base, but trees suck that up in a few days, keep it well watered and your tree will stay moist for weeks longer.
customer_reviews.author: Merica Matters!

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about it years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling for years setting up the large 12' trees to enjoy in my 'great' room (19' ceiling). The Jack-Post Welded Steel Stand, rendered my job the easiest imagineable ! Perfectly straight tree not leaning or unbalanced, no 'guy wires' needed to tie to wall, a really professional looking installation, secure and trustworthy for the season, done in mere minutes! !
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it! Best stand we have ever had! Loved it. Holds the tree up perfectly and is sturdy. Way better than plastic. It’s a stand you can use for years!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: What a tree stand should be
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly how an xmas tree stand should be. Sturdy, leak-proof, easy to set up, keeps the tree standing. No more plastic garbage every year; this is the only stand I will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: ljm

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: We got a real Christmas tree for the first time in a long time and needed a new stand. This stand worked great! It is very solidly built and extremely sturdy. The description mentions that it is for trees up to 8 feet tall, but our tree was closer to 9 feet tall and the stand still worked great. The tree was solid and never even appeared close to being unstable. This was especially important to us with a toddler running around the house.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, well made tree stand
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY DUTY, very well made, if your looking for a tough heavy duty tree stand, this is it
customer_reviews.author: RB-St Louis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have a 10' tree and it was hard to get it stabilized in the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen Snyder

customer_reviews.title: This product was a lot bigger than I expected (and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was a lot bigger than I expected (and heavier), but it is completely durable and just what I needed! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... tree stand I've ever purchased and I was very pleased! Held up even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: First tree stand I've ever purchased and I was very pleased! Held up even better than I expected. Very sturdy and reliable, I would definelty recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tree stand, good size water bowl. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: DC Schell

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I usually dread setting up the tree. We always have a tall tree and It usually requires 2 - 3 people and securing it to the wall. This tear it was so easy. The stand is VERY sturdy and requires no extra securing. Wish I got it many years go.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Brown

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Christmas tree stand.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The right size for my 6-8' live Christmas trees. Large water holder. Rugged all-steel construction will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful2019

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds
customer_reviews.text: Very stable, substantial tree stand. Am confident it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works. Did not even wire the ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and works. Did not even wire the tree to the wall. Very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Found it at Lowes cheaper. Last one lasted 20 years
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: Best send ever. Holds 8 foot (and very wide) tree without any issues
customer_reviews.author: TONY WALSH

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this hoping it would cut back on some of the strings we used to hold up our 12 foot tree last year. To our pleasant surprise, the stand COMPLETELY eliminated the use of string! It's so sturdy that our 12'4" tree stands all by itself—even when we nudge it in an attempt to knock it over. This stand was totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. Held our 12' tree up with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service / product
customer_reviews.text: These guys are great! Not only do they have a good product, sturdy and built well, but there customer service is fantastic. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stand! It doesnt get any durable than this
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stand ! It doesnt get any durable than this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy. No water spill. Easy to set up tree.
customer_reviews.author: Debra O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Met and exceeded expectation. Solid. Will pas from me down to my grandaughter
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made sturdy stand that held our tree without room for wiggly and is sure to last us years.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: This stand really made it easy. No issues taking it down either
customer_reviews.text: This is the first real Christmas tree we've had. This stand really made it easy. No issues taking it down either. So far so good. We'll use it again next year and if there are any changes we will re-post.
customer_reviews.author: Renee C Jewett

customer_reviews.title: satisified Amazon customer
customer_reviews.text: Did everything specified - Very satisfied - shipment on time -- Tree size 8 foot - Strong construction - Easy to keep straight snd Firm in stand - Easy watering

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tree stand I have ever used in 49 years!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy N. Cress

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have had both good and bad experiences with tree stands. Always have a 12' tree. The water tank was my objective. Even Santa approved.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have a 11ft tree and the stand worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: solid stand
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use , well constructed and does the job. I would recommend this product . It looks like it is built to last.
customer_reviews.author: robert baker

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Loved this - red base helps keep it from scratching our floor and hold it in place. It felt secure and strong.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: worst stand on the market for larger tree's
customer_reviews.text: Got this one for the family for our first big Christmas tree. Got the stand onto the tree with a little fight and a few minutes after standing the tree up, it came crashing to the floor damaging furniture along the way. The poorly welded stand broke a leg off. Very poorly made stand. Don't make the same mistake that I did. I had to order another stand and wait a week with the tree laying in the house till the new one came. Don't buy unless you want to ruin Christmas for your family.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand - very durable
customer_reviews.text: The stand worked as it said it would. Easy to set up and will last us many Christmas's to come!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Schweon

customer_reviews.title: This is a good solid stand seems to be well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solid stand seems to be well made, holds a 9' tree with no problem I was able to move the tree around for placement it stayed solid. The only fault I have with the stand is the water bowl is too small, with a fresh tree you have to fill it twice a day. All in all I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, heavy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, heavy, sturdy tree stand. Great price for this item, also. The cats will NOT be knocking over the tree this year!!
customer_reviews.author: Xenavegan "Jen"

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. 11 foot Tree has been up a week and kids bumped into it several times with no issues of it leaning or falling over. The nuts were not welded to the bolts which caused some aggravation when screwing them into the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: K. Trucko

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Treee stand I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best tree stand ever. These are so sturdy. I first found one at the grocery store after Christmas sale of all places. Later we purchased this to have another size. Love it. Will never use the cheap flimsy ones again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Flowers Mills

customer_reviews.title: I appears to be very sturdy and should handle my Christmas trees for years to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet tried this item out. I appears to be very sturdy and should handle my Christmas trees for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Richard LaFeir

customer_reviews.title: The best tree stand I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tree stand! It's durable, steady, and will clearly last a long time with proper care. As another reviewer said, I'd recommend cleaning and drying it thoroughly after use, then applying an appropriate hardware lubricant to the screws to avoid them rusting shut during storage. The reservoir holds enough water to avoid daily refilling based on your home's climate and the type of tree you have. It was very easy to stand the tree straight. I'm very happy with this purchase and look forward to many years of use!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent- well built stand.
customer_reviews.text: A really nice heavy duty stand. We buy 7-8 foot trees and our previous stand would not accommodate the larger trunks causing me to butcher the trunk to make it fit. We purchased the large stand and no longer will have a problem with an undersized stand. I weld for a living so I can tell you that the welds are of top quality on this stand. A touch pricy but the lesson is that you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Goat-Cam1

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the medium stand. I was a little worried that it wouldn’t be sturdy enough for a 6.5’ tree, but the medium stand felt very secure. I had zero worries about the tree falling. With 2 adults it was incredibly easy to get the tree in the stand and set up. The basin is nice and wide, which makes it easier to see if tree needs watering and also for watering the tree. This really is an inexpensive stand, with a foolproof design and minimal moving pieces (that could break down the road). It works and doesn’t overcomplicate having a real Christmas tree. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy on carpet!
customer_reviews.text: We have about a 12' peaked ceiling where we put our tree, but it's on carpet. Some of the other stands I looked at, I didn't fully trust would be stable on carpet. This thing is SOLID. we got a 10' tree and it held PERFECTLY. Love this thing and so happy I invested in it.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: Solid tree stand for larger trees
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a tree stand that holds 9-10ft trees without falling over, this one is solid, tree has stood like a rock, despite cats climbing in it a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are accurate. The stand is very sturdy, all metal, and with plastic "shoes" that won't scratch the floor. A great investment. It will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Claire B

customer_reviews.title: High quality sturdy tree stand
customer_reviews.text: This tree stand is a high quality stand, that performed as well as I had expected, It had no problem with the 7+ foot tree that I bought. I felt that it was extremely sturdy and held a good amount of water. One of the locking bolts on it was damaged, but I could probably replace it cheaply from a local hardware store and it didn't affect the stability at all.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, durable
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for the money. We tried an inexpensive plastic stand last year - it cracked and was an absolute nightmare to work with. Prior to that we had a cheap, flimsy metal stand that rusted and bent. This stand (size Large) is very solidly built of thick steel (with solid plastic feet) and can easily accommodate 6.5" trunks. Why waste time and money on cheap stuff? This stand will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Eric the Viking

customer_reviews.title: BEST TREE STAND
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Christmas tree stand out there! Trust me. Your tree is NOT tipping over in this thing and it is so worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Give them your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a purchase for life. THE most absurdly solid tree stand I've ever seen besides it's own roots.
customer_reviews.author: petrock

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price and awesome stability provided by this tree stand. Far better than anything you can get at the store. Love that it is so well built. We used a 7.5 foot tree and just slid right into the stand, no need for cutting down the sides.
customer_reviews.author: livingtheCAdream

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very we'll constructive Christmas tree stand. Mig welded joints and large stance to keep the tree from falling. The anchor bolts hold the tree very well on center. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Shepard

customer_reviews.title: I think it could survive a nuclear attack and keep the tree upright!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built like a tank. By far the best stand I have ever used. I suspect this is the last stand I will ever have to buy. That is pretty green as is the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A. Wilmarth

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: Using on a 7 foot tree and its solid as a rock. Had no issues fitting trunk in as others have. Holds plenty of water!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Specialist

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: It is very stable. It looks a little bulky but the tree skirt covered it great. It has kept the tree fresh. No needle drop. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: Finally. Something that is made from heavy gauge metal, solid, and built to last. Too bad it's made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mayotte

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: This tree stand is the real deal that makes all the others look like the junk they are. Buy it and you'll have it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: great stand
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to crawl under tree to water it very often. Very sturdy, my tree doesn't wobble like it did in the old stand.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and reliable. Cost is great, was $20 more at tree lot . Fits a standard 7 foot tree, probably even up to a 9ft tree.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Macias

customer_reviews.title: Solid large tree stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand after our large tree bent our stand. This stand is very solid. It also holds much more water making watering less frequent.
customer_reviews.author: Therider01

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to quickly adjust the tree to its perfectly upright ...
customer_reviews.text: Big upgrade over our previous "heavy duty" tree stand! It was very easy to quickly adjust the tree to its perfectly upright position---five minutes or less. For the first time I felt very confident the tree would not fall over. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Armchair Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Looks To Be A Great Tree Stand
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it quite yet BUT it looks to be an awesome tree stand. It is very sturdy, heavy and the prongs that you twist to hold the tree are very well made with a wider base to hold more surface area on the tree, thus creating it to be held securely. There is nothing that looks to break down over time, (like with plastic pieces from our last tree stand) and looks like watering the tree shouldn't be complicated. Now all we need is a tree!
customer_reviews.author: Corissa L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish it held more water, and I needed to carve off a portion of the trunk to fit it into the 6" hole. However it held a big tree up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Larson

customer_reviews.title: there can be only one
customer_reviews.text: no comparison. this is the very best tree stand money can buy. it will support anything from charlie brown's tree to cousin Eddy and anything in between.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is naive sturdy stand, takes a little getting used to with the water. If you don't put it right in the middle the tree does not get the water.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Sharp

product_meta.title: JACK-POST Welded Steel Christmas Tree Stand, for Trees Up to 12-Feet, 1.7-Gallon Water Capacity
product_meta.description: Size:LargeJack-post Corporation is an industry leader in manufacturing outdoor furniture and Christmas tree stands, founded in 1964.
feature_bullets: Fits up to 12' tree with 7" trunk
4 T-nut tipped eye bolt welded tubular steel Christmas Tree Stand. Use for up to a12-foot tree, 6.25-inch trunk, 4-legs with a 29.75-inch base. Easy to fill 1.7-gallon oversized water bowl.
4 eye-bolts hold tree trunk securely. Steel spike base for stability. Tubular steel legs will not flex under the load of heavy trees. Corrosion-resistant 'gold tone' zinc-dichromate hardware.
Powder coated finish resists corrosion and adds durability
Four heavy duty eyebolts hold tree in place

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars153 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
